channel.title: Easy capture on pokemon ranger
channel.description:
pc way:
lag your pc as it will make you draw lines
1 sec ~ 1 line
now lagged:
1 sec ~ 5 lines
ds version run rings anywere and then go round the pokemon
then ring somewere else then round pokemon etc
good luck!
